DOC.brief_title: Memory Thinking Skills Workshop Improve Cognition Gynecologic Breast Cancer Survivors With Cognitive Symptoms
DOC.detailed_description: PRIMARY OBJECTIVES : I . To objectively assess change cognitive performance quality life ( QOL ) pre post participation cognitive rehabilitation intervention gynecologic breast cancer survivor undergo chemotherapy . II . To measure change neural function measure functional magnetic resonance imaging ( fMRI ) blood oxygenation level dependent ( BOLD ) signal correspond behavioral response perform cognitive task . OUTLINE : Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . ARM I ( Skills workshop ) : Patients participate memory think skill workshop weekly 7 week . Patients complete cognitive test questionnaires pre-baseline ( Visit 1 ) , baseline ( Visit 2 ) , 7 week ( Visit 3 ) . ARM II ( Education workshop ) : Patients participate education workshop 7 week 1-hour duration group focus brain cognition . Patients complete cognitive test questionnaires pre-baseline ( Visit 1 ) , baseline ( Visit 2 ) , 7 week ( Visit 3 ) .
